fpond_lin.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 ! ==================================================================
00003 !
00004 !                        PONDEROMOTIVE FORCE
00005 !
00006 !  Compute relativistic fpond for standing wave field, linear rise-time
00007 !
00008 ! ==================================================================
00009 
00010 subroutine fpond_lin(t,tpulse,sigma_in,vosc,omega,rho_upper,x,y,z,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipon)
00011 
00012   implicit none
00013   real, intent(in) :: t ! time
00014   real, intent(in) :: tpulse ! pulse duration/rise time
00015   real, intent(in) :: vosc ! quiver strength
00016   real, intent(in) :: sigma_in ! pulse width (1/e)
00017   real, intent(in) :: omega ! laser frequency
00018   real, intent(in) :: x,y,z ! position to evaluate force; x is distance into target from surface (x_c)
00019   real, intent(in) :: rho_upper
00020   real, intent(out) :: phipon, epon_x, epon_y, epon_z ! pond. potential and fields
00021 
00022   real :: xf, yf, zf, Tpon, Rpon, Xpon, Ypon, Zpon, intensity, gamma, sigma, atten, theta
00023   real :: r, pi=3.141592654, phi, chi, a02, sigma0
00024   real :: rho0_up, wp_r, ls_r, gamma_s, f2d
00025   real :: Xprop
00026   real :: Z_R  ! Rayleigh length
00027 
00028   ! fast oscillations 
00029  Tpon = (sin(omega*t))**2
00030 
00031   ! intensity envelope
00032   a02 = vosc**2
00033   intensity = a02*min(1.,t/tpulse) 
00034 
00035   rho0_up = rho_upper*omega**2   ! Effective density of shelf above xc normalised to rho0
00036 
00037   if (sigma_in <0) then
00038      sigma0=-sigma_in
00039      f2d = 0.  ! switch off 2d field components
00040   else
00041      sigma0=sigma_in
00042      f2d=1.
00043   endif
00044 
00045 !  Standing wave in vacuum; evanescent in overdense plasma
00046 !  Use standard solution of Helmholtz equation for step profile
00047 
00048  ! Normalised Rayleigh length k_p Z_R = omega_0/omega_p * (k_p sigma0)^2
00049   Z_R = omega*sigma0**2
00050 
00051   gamma_s = sqrt(1.+4*intensity/rho_upper)  ! gamma factor for EM solution at x=xc
00052   wp_r = sqrt(rho0_up/gamma_s)  ! effective plasma frequency of upper shelf
00053   ls_r = 1./wp_r   ! rel. skin depth
00054 
00055   phi = atan(-omega/wp_r) ! Interface phase factor given by tan(phi) = -k * l_s
00056   chi = omega*x + phi  ! Vacuum phase 
00057 
00058   if (x.le.0) then
00059      xf = omega*sin(2*chi)
00060      Xpon = sin(chi)    ! laser 'Ez'
00061      sigma = sigma0*sqrt(1.+abs(x)**2/Z_R**2) !  Vacuum spot size for Gaussian beam
00062      Xprop = 1.
00063   else
00064      xf = -2/ls_r*sin(phi)**2*exp(-2*x/ls_r)
00065      Xpon = sin(phi)*exp(-x/ls_r)    ! laser Ez inside
00066      sigma = sigma0  ! Don't expand spot inside target
00067      Xprop = exp(-5*x/ls_r)
00068   endif
00069 
00070   r = sqrt(y**2+z**2)
00071 
00072   theta = pi*r/4./sigma  ! sigma is HWHM of sin^2 laser spot 
00073 !  Rpon = exp((-yd**2-zd**2)/sigma**2)  ! Gaussian
00074 
00075   if (r < 2*sigma .and. r/= 0.) then
00076      yf = -pi/4./sigma*y/r*sin(2*theta)
00077      zf = -pi/4./sigma*z/r*sin(2*theta)
00078      Rpon = cos(theta)**2
00079   else if (r >= 2*sigma) then
00080      yf = 0.
00081      zf = 0.
00082      Rpon = 0.
00083   else
00084      Rpon = cos(theta)**2
00085      yf = 0.
00086      zf = 0.
00087   endif
00088 
00089 
00090 
00091   atten = sigma0**2/sigma**2
00092 !  phipon = 4*Xpon**2*Rpon*atten*intensity  ! intensity, including attenuation factor
00093   phipon = Xprop*Rpon*atten*intensity  ! intensity for 'demo' display, including attenuation factor
00094 
00095   gamma = sqrt(1.+abs(phipon*Tpon))  ! relativistic phi_pond
00096 
00097   Epon_x = 2*intensity*Tpon*Rpon/gamma*xf*atten
00098   Epon_y = f2d*2*intensity*Tpon*Xpon**2/gamma*yf*atten
00099   Epon_z = f2d*2*intensity*Tpon*Xpon**2/gamma*zf*atten
00100 !  Epon_z = 0.   
00101 
00102 end subroutine fpond_lin
